nodes.text: Eriadu Mining and Shipping, also known as Eriadu Mining, was a corporation based on Eriadu that specialized in mining and shipping operations. For some time, the company was forced to deal with pirates in their area of influence. Later, after the Trade Federation's monopoly over the Outer Rim Territories was broken as a result of their failed occupation of the planet Naboo, Eriadu Mining found greater prosperity within the Outer Rim.
